---
title: "Colorado"
format: html
---

```{r}

library(sf)
library(terra)
library(tidyverse)
library(spData)
library(spDataLarge)

library(tmap) # for static and interactive maps
library(leaflet) # for interactive maps

library(tigris) # for downloading county maps

library(tidycensus) # For working with US Census Data

```

```{r}

co_counties <- counties(state = 'CO', cb = TRUE, class = 'sf')

```

```{r}

tm_shape(co_counties) +
  tm_polygons(col = 'white', border.col = 'black') +
  tm_layout(title = 'Colorado Counties')

```

```{r}

tm_shape(co_counties) +
  tm_polygons("ALAND", palette = 'Blues', title = 'Land Area')

```
